meanings.definition: The quality of being approachable or accessible.
meanings.sent1: Her approachabilities made her a favorite among the students.
meanings.sent2: The approachabilities of the new manager improved team communication.
meanings.sent3: The approachabilities of the friendly dog made everyone want to pet him.
meanings.sent4: His approachabilities were like a welcoming beacon in the office.
meanings.sent5: The approachabilities of the library staff made borrowing books a breeze.

meanings.definition: The state of being easy to approach or reach.
meanings.sent1: The approachabilities of the store made shopping convenient for customers.
meanings.sent2: The approachabilities of the park attracted many visitors.
meanings.sent3: The approachabilities of the ice cream truck brought joy to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The approachabilities of the online platform simplified the booking process.
meanings.sent5: The approachabilities of the bus stop ensured timely arrivals for commuters.
